subject: Re: Website Updates - Natroccia and Artsense Images

full_threads.body:
Hi there, 

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here are the links: 
https://talostone.com.au/artsense-collection/pure-range/white-mist-301s
https://talostone.com.au/artsense-collection/pure-range/vanilla-oat-302s
https://talostone.com.au/artsense-collection/pure-range/orion-grey-303s
https://talostone.com.au/artsense-collection/pure-range/black-onyx-305s
https://talostone.com.au/artsense-collection/classical-range/tumbled-grey-502t
https://talostone.com.au/artsense-collection/classical-range/silver-travertine-503t
https://talostone.com.au/artsense-collection/classical-range/classic-travertine-505t
https://talostone.com.au/artsense-collection/luxury-range/vagli-gold-603s
https://talostone.com.au/artsense-collection/luxury-range/nero-antico-605s

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Hi Rica,

Please change some of the images from the link, there are some that is placed in the wrong colour name, thanks.

1. https://talostone.com.au/artsense-collection/pure-range/white-mist-301s
Please remove crossed out images from Arabescato Borghini MinQ Zero range. Only leave one White Mist image.



2. https://talostone.com.au/artsense-collection/pure-range/vanilla-oat-302s
Please do the same and remove all Arabescato Borghini MinQ Zero range, only leave the one image of Vanilla Oat.

3. https://talostone.com.au/artsense-collection/pure-range/orion-grey-303s
Please remove all Arabescato Borghini MinQ Zero range, only leave the two image of Orion Grey.


4. https://talostone.com.au/artsense-collection/pure-range/black-onyx-305s
Please remove all Arabescato Borghini MinQ Zero range, only leave the three image of Black Onyx.


5. https://talostone.com.au/artsense-collection/classical-range/tumbled-grey-502t
Please remove all Arabescato Borghini MinQ Zero range, only leave the one image of Tumbled Grey.

6. https://talostone.com.au/artsense-collection/classical-range/silver-travertine-503t
Please remove all Arabescato Borghini MinQ Zero range, only leave the one image of Silver Travertine.

7. https://talostone.com.au/artsense-collection/classical-range/classic-travertine-505t
Please remove all Arabescato Borghini MinQ Zero range, only leave the one image of Classic Travertine.

8. https://talostone.com.au/artsense-collection/luxury-range/black-onyx-305s-copy-copy
Please update weblink to say this: https://talostone.com.au/artsense-collection/luxury-range/vagli-gold-603s
Please remove all Arabescato Borghini MinQ Zero range, only leave the one image of Vagli Gold.

9. https://talostone.com.au/artsense-collection/luxury-range/black-onyx-305s-copy
Please update weblink to say this: https://talostone.com.au/artsense-collection/luxury-range/nero-antico-605s
Please remove images from Arabescato Borghini MinQ Zero range, only keep one image Nero Antico.

Best regards,



Tien

Office Manager

Head Office | Mon - Thu



tien@talostone.com.au



02 8783 0600



talostone.com.au

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi team,

Hope you are well.
Can you please update these latest images to our website gallery.
The names of the colours are on the image file.

Natroccia:
1. Talostone Natroccia Prada (3x images)
2. Talostone Natroccia Super White Dolomite (2x images)
3. Talostone Natroccia Taj Mahal (1x image)
Link: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/11xcOiDz7pHOFywtCMv6UmHuRW5wnoLN4?usp=share_link

Artsense:
1. Talostone Artsense Whte Mist (1x image)
2. Talostone Artsense Vanilla Oat (1x image)
3. Talostone Artsense Orion Grey (2x image)
4. Talostone Artsense Black Onyx (3x image)
5. Talostone Artsense Tumbled Grey (1x image)
6. Talostone Artsense Silver Travertine (1x image)
7. Talostone Artsense Classical Travertine (1x image)
8. Talostone Artsense Vagli Gold (1x image)
9. Talostone Artsense Nero Antico (1x image)
Link: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1yYENB1TcTaki7TXsMv6YMwH24rVrRbTI?usp=share_link


Best regards,

Tien

Office Manager

Head Office | Mon - Thu

tien@talostone.com.au
